price: 43. Y si quisiéramos, los ahogaríamos y no tendrían quién los socorriese; y no se salvarían,
arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأۡ نُغۡرِقۡهُمۡ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنقَذُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-in nasha nugh'riq'hum falā ṣarīkha lahum walā hum yunqadhūna
translations: (would be) a responder to a cry
